storyInfo: The boarding party's plans aboard the airship are disrupted by the revenant, with the team separated from one another. W saves the Doctor from falling, while Kal'tsit is trapped by herself.

attributes.content: Alright, any more weird shadows that wanna get blown to pieces?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Well, shit. There actually is one.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Cutting down their numbers is most likely pointless, W. They're simply the projections of the revenant's power.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So long as the revenant dwells on the ship, there will be no end to its creations.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is nothing more than a means to buy time.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then how about I blow a couple more holes until the revenant decides to come out of hiding?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm afraid that won't work.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This whole ship is nothing but the revenant's husk. Even if you were to destroy the ship's outer shell or blow it, the revenant would still be able to keep it running with witchcraft.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It would only temporarily keep it functional, but it would be more than enough to take them to Amnannam.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: To completely stop the airship, we must find and destroy the revenant's core.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Gotta say, we Sarkaz are up to some really weird shit. Keeps you up at night.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Can't we take care of this with a bomb?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The firepower of an entire fleet's main guns might break through its outer shell, stopping it from operating, even using witchcraft.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Alright, let's go look for that core, then.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: One day, I'm gonna get myself a cannon.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: How do we find the revenant's core?

attributes.content: I'm not certain. As the true core of the airship, it is certainly protected by layers of defenses, hidden away carefully in some cabin.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We will only uncover it by infiltrating deeper into the ship.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This also means that our enemies will be able to defend it much more easily.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There is no time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Is the revenant privy to everything about the airship?

attributes.content: Theoretically, but the airship is large in size. Its attention is limited.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ines's been on this ship, and she still got out of here without a scratch, didn't she?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Well, it could also be because she's not a real Sarkaz and can't feel the mental pressure the revenant lays on.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: We need to work with each other.;We must find a way to distract the revenant.

attributes.content: Doctor, you mean...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: When somebody's hurting real bad, they won't notice an insect crawling up their pants.

attributes.content: Come clean. Is this a trap you've been setting up for a long time, and you're only telling me about it now?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: You're the best one for the job.;No one makes a ruckus better than you.

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Guilty as charged.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Alright, buy some time. Then buy some more.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Lemme get one thing clear, though. I'm not your bait this time.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: If the revenant's really sharper than we thought...

attributes.content: You wink at Amiya, who stares blankly at you for a second before nodding.
That enough of a ruckus for you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Alright, you insects. Don't get spotted too easily.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Not until you find her.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Doctor, Amiya, we'll enter the airship through the opening W made.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Stay close.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is our one and only chance.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's empty.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It seems the Military Commission has already evacuated all the passengers. They knew how dangerous this mission would be.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Kal'tsit, if the airship's really going to collide with Amnannam...

attributes.content: Amnannam will assimilate all information it comes into contact with.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That includes all materials, organic or not, even personalities and emotions... Everything will be engulfed in Originium crystals.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then Theresa and the revenant...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes, they chose to sail there, and it means they understand what this entails.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: What do they want from the Originium?

attributes.content: A deep, sophisticated voice can be heard from within the cabin.
But there are no signs of life. The hallway is as empty as before.
...It sounds familiar.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In this place, its voice... can be heard by all.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: In Minoan legend, a hero stole fire for mankind, and for this, he was punished by the gods and set ablaze for eternity.
Very few know that this legend... originated among the Sarkaz.
His story thereafter is unworthy of telling.

attributes.content: The revenant...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It noticed us nonetheless.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In just the blink of the eye, countless strange shadows fill what was an empty corridor.
The revenant's words are emitted from their vibrations.

attributes.text: That explosion... It was indeed cause for concern and anxiety.
If it wasn't for the King of Sarkaz's reminder, I really would've forgotten all about you.
Oh, how forgetful of me... I've remembered more than enough, but I should never have forgotten.
False King of Sarkaz, how could I have ignored your existenceâ€”

attributes.content: Mon3tr, get ready for battle! Amiya, protect the Doctor!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Immediately, a pitch black spear solidifies at Amiya's fingertips before launching forward.
However, it is swallowed whole by the walls and stairs.

attributes.text: How can you possibly kill me while you're within me?

attributes.content: There are too many of them. We need to move!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Each and every corridor looks the same. Each and every staircase seems to be connected to the same space.
These are nothing but the revenant's blood vessels, and its will can manifest anywhere.
It's no good. We can't shake them!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You find it difficult to keep your eyes open because of the massive explosion, but the plan continues to be executed as expected.
Bunny, swap sides!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, have your little pet hold onto the dead weight. We need to quicklyâ€”
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hold on, this place...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Suddenly, you are struck with a bad feeling.

attributes.options: W's bombs can't be this strong!

attributes.content: Using the explosion's momentum, the entire corridor is being torn apart by its master's own will.
You feel yourself sliding down a corridor leading downstairs.
Hey, old hagâ€”
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You try your hardest to maintain your balance and look toward where you last saw Kal'tsit, only to find that she has been completely engulfed by the black shadow.
The revenant itself tore the structure here apart! It's trying toâ€”
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A loud bang can be heard, and Amiya disappears on the other end of the collapsing corridor.
Grrâ€”
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Little bunny, hold on.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: A black shadow sweeps by, separating you and W. The moment you two turn around, a sharp blade made of witchcraft slices through where you two were moments earlier.
(Impatient braying)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: It fails to hook onto your collar with its claw, and you tumble downstairs down the corridor.
(Impatient howling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Before your crash into the floor of the area downstairs, a hand grabs you by your collar from behind.
Gotcha...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No, I should say... you finally fell right into my hands.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: *creak*... *creak*... *creak*...
The sound of steel being bent and twisted echoes throughout the narrow space. The ship is chewing apart the darkness inside its body.
You put in quite a bit of work simply to force me into this closed-off trap.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Revenant.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: With the way you are, have you forgotten even your name?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There is no response.
*creak*... Nothing can be heard except for the sound of metal being torn apart. Sharp debris continue to peel and fall away from the ship's body...
Kal'tsit knows that if this unknown space is anything likea magnetic fieldâ€”
She must be the center pulling in all fatal threats.
A threat?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It seems that even though you have burned away for years, you still have some sanity left in you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But if your chaotic mind still holds a trace of memories in Kazdel...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You should be well aware that death threats are meaningless to me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Silence.
But Kal'tsit can feel that the shadows that will engulf her here are still lurking in the darkness, watching her.
Waiting for the moment to strike.
No, you should know... After all, Theresa herself knows this well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You are listening, are you notâ€”
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Theresa?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I can feel your will in this ship.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I thought you would be here waiting for me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit reaches her hand out to the wall to feel the life in this ship.
Ice-cold, coarse metal... and Originium.
Despite the darkness, Kal'tsit is nonetheless able to clearly see the Originium growing and assimilating everything around itâ€”
But it avoids the area her fingers touched.
To think you can now influence the natural growth of Originium to this extent...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If the Originium here continues to grow, the airship will be completely crystallized by the time it crashes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And then everybody inside will alsoâ€”
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That includes me?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So is this what you are trying to tell me?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She gets no response.
The first Originium, you, Theresis, the Sarkaz... I used to think I knew enough about your plan.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But it seems you are much further down this road than I imagined...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You may have me locked away here, but I don't believe I am truly the one you should be vigilant against.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You've always been a headache, Theresa. Just like in the past.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Just like in the past.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Theresa, as you are now, do you still believe...?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...that Terra has a future?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A dark shadow extends underneath Kal'tsit's feet.
A jet black ocean gushes out from the darkness, ready to engulf everything in its path in no time.
I knew itâ€”
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Once again, silence has returned to the darkness.

attributes.text: You'd better have enough time with the Dame alone, without that one at her side.
Don't disappoint me again. Don't disappoint us again!
I've waited too long... I must witness this before my deathâ€”
